content: I'd like to know the status of bulk data $import. Is this moving at a slower pace than export or not at all?

There's no formal standards work happening around an $import operation, but we've had consistent community interest around a cluster of related use cases. @Dan Gottlieb has been working on some proposal's for import that better leverage existing export capabilities.

Yup, good timing on the question - I'm hoping to have a draft of a new proposal posted in the next week or two to start to collect early feedback. As Josh pointed out though, the standards work recently has been around getting v2 of bulk export finished.
Hi @Dan Gottlieb is there any update on the status of bulk data $import?
Yup! I posted a writeup of my thoughts on a potential bulk import approach at https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/bulk-import/blob/master/import-pnp.md .

Of course, there isn't currently an active standards project around bulk import so my goal with this is just to get some ideas on paper to support initial prototyping and as starting point for folks to contribute their ideas. Open to suggestions, alternative directions, etc!

:wave: We're interested in testing the new PnP spec. We're planning to develop a client or server or both, but we're not sure if we'll have it ready by Sept, it might take us until the Jan '22 Connectathon.
Happy to speak to any other interested parties
